verbs.description: If [ARG0: President Trump] [V: has] [ARG1: nothing to hide] , then why does n't he show the American people his tax returns and his business ' financial records ?
If President Trump has [ARG1: nothing] to [V: hide] , then why does n't he show the American people his tax returns and his business ' financial records ?
If President Trump has nothing to hide , then why [V: does] n't he show the American people his tax returns and his business ' financial records ?
If President Trump has nothing to hide , then [ARGM-CAU: why] does [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG0: he] [V: show] [ARG2: the American people] [ARG1: his tax returns and his business ' financial records] ?
